description.value:
Basic Attack

At-Will

Standard

Reach 2

+16 vs AC; 1d6+5 damage.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Force

Standard

Ranged 20

+16 vs Reflex; 1d6+7 force damage, and ongoing 5 variable damage. The ongoing damage is a type to which the target is most vulnerable (sharn's choice; the damage type doesn't change once chosen). If the target has no vulnerability, the ongoing damage is force.

At-Will ✦ Conjuration

Minor

Ranged 5

Sustain Minor

The sharn creates a hexogonal window of blue light that it can attack through as if it were in that portal's space. As a minor action, it can move one portal up to 4 squares. Portals don't block line of sight, line of effect, or enemy movement. A sharn can maintain up to three such portals at a time with a single minor action; it can close as many as it wishes with a free action.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Fire, Force

Standard

+17 vs Fortitude; 2d6+7 fire and force damage. Secondary Targets: +17 vs. Reflex; 1d6+7 fire and force damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).

At-Will

Standard

The sharn makes two basic attacks (melee or ranged). If two different kinds of basic attacks hit the same target (such as a claw and a bite), that target is also dazed (save ends).

Encounter ✦ Healing

Standard

The sharn spends a healing surge and heals 153 hit points. The sharn gains a +2 bonus to all defenses until the start of its next turn.

Encounter

Standard

An sharn rolls initiative twice, gets two turns during a round, and has a full set of actions (standard, move, minor) on each turn. Each set of actions corresponds to a different consciousness. The sharn's ability to take immediate actions refreshes on each of its turns.
The sharn automatically saves against the dazed and stunned conditions and against charm effects that a save can end.

Encounter

Standard

A sharn can make opportunity attacks against all enemies within its reach (2 squares), including through hex portals.

Regeneration 10
Immune pertrification, polymorph 		Init +12 | AP 2 | Save +5 (+8 against fear effects, and against conditions that hinder movement)
AC 28Fort 28Ref 28Will 29

Con 23 (+12)		Dex 23 (+12)
Int 21 (+11)		Wis 8 (+5)
Cha 24 (+13)
Languages Common, Deep Speech
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Arcana +16, Insight +10, Religion +16Senses Darkvision
Passive Perception 15 | Insight 20
